Text: Boss man...? Where is Boss man?

I-It can't be true, can it? He must be hiding
somewhere!
Master Shadow! Master Shadow?! Where are you?!

...You've got to be kidding. Master Shadow, beaten
by that guy...?

She must be shocked about Master Shadow... After
all, Lady Alpha has been supporting him the
longest...
(We're back to before I had to kill Delta...)

Lady Alpha...oh-woof...it's okay! Boss man isn't
gonna lose to him! He's just playing hide-and-seek!
The one who can't see reality is this dumb dog.

It's time you faced reality. I don't want to keep
saying that he's dead.

This is no time for fighting or bemoaning. Time is
of the essence. That thing has a terrifying ability.
Who the heck are you?! You look like Lady Alpha!
...Is this really the time for introductions?

It has the ability to absorb its opponent's magic
and turn it into its own power... Right now, it's
converting the vast amount of magic belonging to
that man. We must defeat it—

Diablos, as in the demon Diablos...? Wasn't he
supposed to have died a thousand years ago...?

I don't understand... And the appearances of those
girls, especially the one named Olivier...
Are these acquaintances of yours, Olivier?
All of you! Stop saying weird things!
Boss man is alive! He didn't die!
